snippet: An encouraging and realistic agreement by student and school leaders to crack down on binge drinking and partying abuses is worthy of being copied elsewhere.
abstract: Editorial welcomes University of Virginia agreement between student and university leaders to ban binge drinking and excessive fraternity partying practices that can lead to sexual assaults; holds new code of behavior for both sides should be emulated at other colleges and universities.
lead_paragraph: An encouraging and realistic agreement by student and school leaders to crack down on binge drinking and partying abuses is worthy of being copied elsewhere.

headline.print_headline: Spring Rush at the University of Virginia
headline.main: Spring Rush at the University of Virginia
